description: Croptopia is massive food mod centered around adding new crops, fruit trees and over /1/200 food items/1/!
These crops and fruits can be farmed by hand or with machines like the farmer or greenhouse controller.
To obtain the seeds you will have to find the crops in the wild and break them or you can buy them on the /e/market/e/
To obtain the saplings you will have to craft them with any sapling and 2 of the desired fruit after finding a fruit tree in the wild or you can buy them on the /e/market/e/
Make sure to also check REI recipes for whatever you want to automate, many foods can be made with /7/Create/7/ via mechanical mixers
